items.title: dataTest
items.manifest: {"longDescription":"This simple widget gives you insight into the weather in different locations you choose. You can access it in your account from wherever you access the internet.","settings":[{"field":"sizes","label":"Sizes","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"300x300\",\"value\":\"300x300\"}]"},{"field":"theme","label":"Theme","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"Light\",\"value\":\"light\"}]"}],"languages":"en","icon":"assets/weatherly-icon.png","shortDescription":"Heads up widget for showing you the weather in relevant locations to you.","title":"DataTest","keyFeatures":["Public data display"],"version":"0.0.1","screenshots":["assets/weatherly-ss-1.png","assets/weatherly-ss-2.png","assets/weatherly-ss-3.png"],"userGenerated":["Location input"],"bannerImage":"assets/weatherly-banner.png","dataTypes":"User-held data","public":["Weather data"],"dataConnectors":["GoogleTimeline/queryActivities","@prifina/oura","@prifina/fitbit","@prifina/garmin"],"name":"dataTest","userHeld":["Session time","Session duration"],"publisher":"Prifina Inc","id":"866fscSq5Ae7bPgUtb6ffB","category":"Weather","deviceSupport":"Desktop browser","age":"3+"}

items.name: weatherWidget
items.title: Weather
items.manifest: {"longDescription":"This simple widget gives you insight into the weather in different locations you choose. You can access it in your account from wherever you access the internet.","settings":[{"field":"city","label":"City","type":"text","value":"New York"},{"field":"sizes","label":"Sizes","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"300x300\",\"value\":\"300x300\"}]"},{"field":"theme","label":"Theme","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"Dark\",\"value\":\"dark\"}]"}],"languages":"en","icon":"assets/weatherly-icon.png","shortDescription":"Heads up widget for showing you the weather in relevant locations to you.","title":"Weather","keyFeatures":["Public data display"],"version":"0.0.1","screenshots":["assets/weatherly-ss-1.png","assets/weatherly-ss-2.png","assets/weatherly-ss-3.png"],"userGenerated":["Location input"],"bannerImage":"assets/weatherly-banner.png","dataTypes":"User-held data","public":["Weather data"],"name":"weatherWidget","userHeld":["Session time","Session duration"],"publisher":"Prifina Inc","id":"o3CH1e2kbrLgBxjbG2iLzd","category":"Weather","dataSources":["API"],"deviceSupport":"Desktop browser","age":"3+"}

items.name: dryRunWidget
items.title: Dry Run
items.manifest: {"longDescription":"Dry Run wants to keep you dry while you exercise. By utilizing your activity habits and open weather data, Dry Run looks out for you and lets you know when it might make sense to deviate from your normal routines. Planned updates for Dry Run include utilizing other weather data types, such as allergens, air quality or pollen.","settings":[{"field":"sizes","label":"Sizes","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"300x300\",\"value\":\"300x300\"}]"},{"field":"theme","label":"Theme","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"Light\",\"value\":\"light\"}]"},{"field":"city","label":"City","type":"text","value":"London"}],"languages":"en","icon":"assets/dryrun-icon.png","shortDescription":"Tired of running in bad weather? With Dry Run, utilize your activity data and you get a heads up when your typical time for a run collides with a sleet or a tropical storm.","title":"Dry Run","keyFeatures":["Personalized activity scheduling suggestions"],"version":"0.0.1","screenshots":["assets/dryrun-ss-1.png","assets/dryrun-ss-2.png","assets/dryrun-ss-3.png"],"userGenerated":["Location input"],"bannerImage":"assets/dryrun-banner.png","dataTypes":"User-held data","public":["Weather data"],"dataConnectors":["@prifina/oura"],"name":"dryRunWidget","userHeld":["Session time","Session duration"],"publisher":"Prifina Inc","id":"3LSdcSs1kcPskBWBJvqGto","category":"Health & Fitness","deviceSupport":"Desktop browser","age":"12+"}

items.name: holisticHealthWidget
items.title: Holistic Health
items.manifest: {"longDescription":"With Holistic Health, you can track your activity from all your wearables in one place, see what targets you have hit and view a snapshot of your daily goals. Utilizing your activity data (active minutes, steps, calories etc) from your wearable devices, you can quickly for an idea of your progress toward your goals and keep yourself accountable.","settings":[{"field":"sizes","label":"Sizes","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"300x300\",\"value\":\"300x300\"}]"},{"field":"theme","label":"Theme","type":"select","value":"[{\"option\":\"Light\",\"value\":\"light\"}]"}],"languages":"en","icon":"assets/holistichealth-icon.png","shortDescription":"Track your activity from your wearables in one place, see what targets you have hit and view a snapshot of your daily goals.","title":"Holistic Health","keyFeatures":["Snapshot of Activity Progress","Local data - use your data without external sharing"],"version":"0.0.1","screenshots":["assets/holistichealth-ss-1.png","assets/holistichealth-ss-2.png","assets/holistichealth-ss-3.png"],"userGenerated":["Goals"],"bannerImage":"assets/holistichealth-banner.png","dataTypes":"User-held data","public":[""],"dataConnectors":["@prifina/oura"],"name":"holisticHealthWidget","userHeld":["Calories burnt","Total deep sleep","Steps taken"],"publisher":"Prifina Inc","id":"sCUiMz2m9JsRSnRJ5favnP","category":"Health & Fitness","deviceSupport":"Desktop browser","age":"12+"}
